title: shop  window too big at 1440x900
body: On my Retina Macbook Pro, I'd prefer to play at 1/2 resolution, which is 1440x900. However, the shop window does not fit on the screen. It also does not seem to shrink based on UI scale or chat window scale, so there is no way to make it small enough to fit on screen.

replies.body: Why not just play at full resolution and adjust UI size? Even a mac with no gpu should be able to handle league graphics pretty well.
